column4: where do the notes get stored from tomboy notes? I know its a hidden file in the home folder right?
where do the notes get stored from tomboy notes? I know its a hidden file in the home folder right?
I don't use tomboy, but if you press ctrl-h in nautilus, can see hiiden files as well
histo yeah i know about ctrl-h but .tomboy isn't it. I guess i'll just poke around until i find it
